title: 4 April, 1996
cardDetailedText: Born as the youngest son in the family.

title: March, 2003
cardDetailedText: Enrolled in Daejeon Sahmyook Elementary school.

title: April, 2007
cardDetailedText: Whole family migrated to the Philippines Cebu when I was 12 years old.

title: September, 2007
cardDetailedText: Enrolled in Woodridge International school, Philippines Cebu.

title: September, 2008
cardDetailedText: Enrolled in Marie Ernestine school, Philippines Cebu.

title: April, 2009
cardDetailedText: Graduate from Marie Ernestine school.

title: September, 2009
cardDetailedText: Enrolled in Woodridge International school, Philippines Cebu.

title: April, 2013
cardDetailedText: Graduate from Woodridge International school.

title: September, 2013
cardDetailedText: Entered University of San Carlos, took Computer Engineering program.

title: April, 2016
cardDetailedText: Ended my 9 years of life in the Philippines.

title: 22 August, 2016
cardDetailedText: Served military service as a military cook in Rebulic of Korea Air Force(ROKAF) for 24 months.

title: 21 August, 2018
cardDetailedText: Successfully finished military service.

title: September, 2018
cardDetailedText: Right after finishing my military service, preparation for transferring to university in South Korea began.

title: March, 2019
cardTitle: Transfer to university in South Korea
cardDetailedText: Transferred from University of San Carlos to Ajou University as 3rd year student and took E-business program.

title: January, 2020
cardDetailedText: Took a year off school and planned for working holidays program to Canada I've always dreamed of.

title: April, 2020
cardDetailedText: Covid-19 outbreak caused Canada to shut down their borders.

title: June, 2020
cardTitle: Started part time job at Kyobo Bookstore
cardDetailedText: As an alternative choice, started a part time job and spent most of the year reading books and finding more about myself.

title: March, 2021
cardDetailedText: After a year off, returned to school to finish the program.

title: December, 2021
cardDetailedText: Made up my mind to enter graduate school last December. So I requested postponement of my graudation to be on August 2022.

title: January, 2022
cardDetailedText: Currently preparing for entering graduate school.

title: 17 June, 2022
cardDetailedText: Got accepted to a Master's in Industrial Engineering program in Yonsei Universityüôåüèº
